title: Rani Haar: The Emerald and Ruby Empress Necklace
materials: Ruby Pear Cut Center Stone (estimated 5 carats)
features: Multi-strand emerald bead necklace, intricate filigree work on gold clasp and pendant, handcrafted pendant featuring a prominent pear-cut ruby surrounded by Polki diamonds. Side clasp features a square cut emerald also surrounded by Polki diamonds. The pendant showcases classic South Indian 'Nakshi' work depicting peacocks, a symbol of beauty and prosperity. The design also features graduating emerald drops and tiny pearls.
description: A masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, this Rani Haar combines the auspicious colors of emerald and ruby with the timeless elegance of pearls and the traditional appeal of Polki diamonds. The intricate Nakshi work and Hyderabadi polish add a touch of regal splendor, making it a cherished heirloom piece. The unique design blends traditional aesthetics with a modern sensibility, making it perfect for the contemporary bride or jewelry connoisseur.
